revised_title: Validity and Applications of Averaging Methods for Nonlinear Systems
tldr: This article investigates the validity and applications of averaging methods for certain nonlinear systems with periodic solutions. The author uses energy methods to establish the validity of these approximations and finds that they can be applied to a broad class of ordinary and partial differential equations. The results show that averaging methods can be used on longer time intervals and provide a basis for informed assessment of their usefulness in various physical systems.
